about.title: About Me
about.description:
Hello! My name is Andrea Harkins (nee Maille) but feel free to call me Andy. I’m a Senior Front End Engineer && Technical Lead based in Toronto, ON. Since 2019, I have worked in both brand and agency settings creating the dreamiest e-commerce experiences. I love the challenges that come with building brands in a digital landscape and truly value how each page view can create meaningful human experiences.

As a engineering leader, I believe in transparency, collaboration and continuous learning. I’m passionate about creating websites that engage users through thoughtful design and building technical solutions that are flexible, scalable and performant. I am a strong advocate for ethical practices within tech spaces and strive to create more accessible, inclusive environments wherever I go.

When I’m not coding, you can catch me planning my next travel adventure, working on a DIY project or diving into a new book.

footer.title: Let's Make Something Great Together.
footer.formSuccess: Thanks for reaching out! I will be in touch as soon as possible.
